title: Roku adds Apple Music support to its platform
content:
Roku announced the global release of the Apple Music app on the Roku platform. What does this mean? Roku owners will now have access to over 90 million songs, exclusive programming, curated playlists, music videos, and more. Apple Music was first unveiled in 2015. The service offered access to millions of songs, not to mention

The post Roku adds Apple Music support to its platform appeared first on XDA.
description: Apple Music support has arrived on Roku. The app can be downloaded to gain access to over 90 million songs.
